violations.message: FAIL: Line 36: Complex Nested Dict Type Annotations - `input: dict[str, Any]` should be Pydantic model; Line 204: Stub/No-Op - `pass # Redis implementation` (appears twice at lines 204, 212); Line 215: Missing Type Hints - `wrapper` function missing return type hint; Line 68: Missing Type Hints - `decorator` function parameter `cls: type` should be `cls: type[T]`; Line 99: Missing Type Hints - `sanitize_for_mcp` returns `dict[str, Any]` (complex nested type, should be Pydantic model); Line 176: Missing Type Hints - `decorator` function missing explicit return type `Callable[[Callable[..., Any]], Callable[..., Any]]`
